boofcv.alg.feature.orientation
Class OrientationIntegralBase<T extends ImageSingleBand,G extends GradientValue>

java.lang.Object
  boofcv.alg.feature.orientation.OrientationIntegralBase<T,G>
All Implemented Interfaces:
OrientationIntegral<T>, RegionOrientation
Direct Known Subclasses:
ImplOrientationAverageGradientIntegral, ImplOrientationImageAverageIntegral, ImplOrientationSlidingWindowIntegral
public abstract class OrientationIntegralBase<T extends ImageSingleBand,G extends GradientValue>
extends java.lang.Object
implements OrientationIntegral<T>

Common base class for integral image region orientation algorithms.

Author:
Peter Abeles

Constructor Detail

OrientationIntegralBase

public OrientationIntegralBase(int radius,
                               double period,
                               int sampleWidth,
                               double weightSigma,
                               java.lang.Class<T> imageType)
Configure orientation estimation.

Parameters:
radius - Radius of the region being considered in terms of samples. Typically 6.
period - How often the image is sampled. This number is scaled. Typically 1.
sampleWidth - How wide of a kernel should be used to sample. Try 4
weightSigma - Sigma for weighting. zero for unweighted.
